text: Sampajānamusāvādo kho panāyyāyo antarāyiko dhammo vutto bhagavatā tasmā saramānāya bhikkhuniyā āpannāya visuddhāpekkhāya santī āpatti āvikātabbā āvikatā hissā phāsu hoti
edit: Sampajānamusāvādo kho panāyyāyo antarāyiko dhammo vutto bhagavatā tasmā saramānāya bhikkhuniyā āpannāya visuddhāpekkhāya santī āpatti āvikātabbā āvikatā hissā phāsu hoti
